basics.name: Vy Ai Vo, Ph.D.
basics.label: AI/ML Research Scientist
basics.summary: I am a senior staff research scientist in the Brain-Inspired Computing Lab, which is a part of Intel Labs.
basics.current: I currently work on deep neural networks, especially focusing on sequential data, natural language processing (NLP), and memory models.
basics.former: Previously I worked on understanding the human visual system as a cognitive computational neuroscientist, especially focusing on tasks with attention and memory demands.
